name: Trouble Brewing (hegojoko)
description:
How to play More

In this colorful game, players have the choice of playing as Marley or Elie: two wacky characters madly in love with each other. Despite their romance, distress has invaded the hearts of our two protagonists and pushes them to put an end to their existence. Fortunately, their love keeps them alive, but for how long?

Preserve your partner from death with the help of your love while freeing yourself from these turmoils before them.

Game jam's theme was "Connection", with constraints:

SURVIVAL   -    VERSUS   -  PROGRESSION
